title: NewAir AWR-460DB Dual Zone 46 Bottle Wine Cooler
description:
Key Features
-Built-in or freestanding cooler for 46 wine bottles
-Classic stainless steel design with spacious hardwood shelves
-Digital temperature control and LCD display
-Dual zone storage keeps white and red wines at perfect temp
-Indirect cooling system with temperature range of 40-64°F
-Receive in-home warranty repairs for added convenience

NewAir AWR-460DB 46 Bottle Wine Cooler
If you love wine, then you need to give it the TLC it deserves. That's why we recommend the dual-zone AWR-460DB wine compressor cooler. This wine cooler offers you the size and flexibility your wine collection demands in a convenient design that's all inclusive and ideal for beginning collectors or connoisseurs.

Flexible Design Options
Thanks to a front veting grille, the NewAir AWR-460DB allows for freestanding placement or its buil-in option under the counter design. Install into your cabinetry for a sophisticated built-in finish, or use it as a freestanding unit. The door is also reversible, giving you complete control of where your wine cooler goes.

Dual Zone Wine Storage
Even more, this spacious unit holds up to 46 bottles of wine in two separate compartments - keep one for red, and one just for white wines. Use it as a freestanding unit or build it into existing cabinetry for a refined finishing touch in your bar or kitchen.. Both cooling zones include independent climate control, which mean you can keep white and red wines separate and at their ideal serving temperatures.

Elegant Appearance
The NewAir AWR-460DB features a beautiful, sleek black cabinet and elegant stainless steel trim that combined makes this wine cooler a favorite design feature in your home. The blue LED light illuminates the interior and highlights your collection beautifully, and the adjustable wooden shelves not only make wine selection easy but also allows you to customize the interior.

Energy-Efficient Compressor System
With a temperature range of 40°F to 66°F, the AWR-460DB provides the exact level of cooling you need for your wine, whether it's for long-term storage or if you want it ready to serve. The compressor cooler ensures an even temperature throughout, quiet and virtually vibration free operation. Plus, the compressor has a 10 year life expectancy.

Digital Temperature Advantage
The electronic thermostat and digital control panel gives you precise control over the interior temperature, and lets you easily monitor conditions to make sure your wine is stored properly. There's a security lock to ensure safe storage and an ETL certification safe use. A bulit in internal carbon filter helps keep the interior smelling good and free of  pesky odors.

Insulation and more
The NewAir 46 bottle wine cooler maintians an ideal temperature for perfect storage of all your best vintages. Dual pane protective glass door and triple layer insulation work together to ensure proper chilling. Security locking door keeps you wine safe and sound, plus, there's an in-home warranty to guarantee product reliability and performance.

Buy online: http://www.newair.com/products/awr-460db

transcripts: Collectors know that great wine is as much an art form as it is good craftsmanship but in order for wine too mature to its fullest perfection it needs the right conditions. How can we keep it that way? Where is there a name we can trust? Introducing the AWR 460DB deluxe wine cooler and innovative environment control system with the touch of elegance. It's one of the best reviewed and most trusted systems on the market. A wine needs the right temperature to mature properly if it's too warm it ages prematurely losing it's flavor, if it's too cold the court contracts letting an oxygen and ruining the wine. The AWR 460DB as a special energy efficient compressor that cools your wine evenly, its triple layer insulation and dual pane protective glass keep the temperature perfect. Its internal carbon filter keeps the air pure and it's fronting compressor is super quiet. Before you install it please refer to the measurements on your screen to ensure you have the right amount of space. There's also a safety lock to keep your wine away from any unwanted customers, that has a 10 year life expectancy and he uses no harsh chemicals its environment friendly and its dual zone you can set at different temperatures to keep your reds and whites separate. The digital display and easy push-button controls let you keep the temperature exactly how you want it. The  AWR 460DB is one of the best reviewed wine coolers online people like that it's adjustable natural wood shelves it up to forty six bottles of wine and that the LED light add a touch of elegance. Whether for your living area, kitchen, bar, or impressing at a party the AWR 460DB is one of the most proven and trusted wine temperature control systems on the market. Don't let the element stop you from crafting your wine to perfection, for dependability and innovation you can count on NewAir [Music] NewAir a name you can trust.
